nodes.text: Holowan Labs was a facility of Holowan Laboratories located in the Network Security District on Nar Shaddaa. It contained a show room, where Holowan Industries was demonstrating new battle droid models to their Republic clients sometime around the year 3642 BBY. Agent Ryleah of Imperial Intelligence tasked an unknown party to raid Holowan Labs and steal the battle droids' schematics for the Sith.
